snippet: In what may be a first for professional sports, fans of Major League Soccer’s Seattle Sounders will vote on whether the team should retain the club’s general manager Adrian Hanauer.
abstract: Fans of Major League Soccer’s Seattle Sounders will vote on whether the team should retain the club’s general manager Adrian Hanauer, in what may be a first for American professional sports.
lead_paragraph: In what may be a first for professional sports, fans of Major League Soccer’s Seattle Sounders will vote on whether the team should retain the club’s general manager Adrian Hanauer.

headline.seo: In Seattle, Polls Soon Open for Voting on Fate of Soccer Team’s G.M.
headline.main: Rooting on the Home Team, and Voting on Its G.M.
headline.print_headline: Rooting On Home Team, and Voting on Its G.M.
